meta.title: Session 30: 21st Century Study Skills & AI Tools
meta.description: Explores modern digital tools for education, including AI coding assistants, language apps, smart research platforms, and productivity trackers.

studyTopics.learningOutcome: Identify AI tools that assist in learning and writing computer code.

questions.question: Which mobile application uses your camera to scan and solve mathematical equations instantly?
questions.explanation: PhotoMath uses Optical Character Recognition (OCR) to read math problems and provides step-by-step solutions.

questions.question: What is the primary purpose of 'Amazon CodeWhisperer'?
options: To suggest and generate computer code using AI
questions.explanation: Amazon CodeWhisperer is an AI-powered coding companion that generates code suggestions in real-time.

questions.question: Which platform is famous for hosting short, powerful talks on Technology, Entertainment, and Design?
questions.explanation: TED Talks are influential videos from expert speakers on education, business, science, and tech.

questions.question: You want to digitize your handwritten notes by taking a photo and copying the text. Which tool should you use?
questions.explanation: Google Lens allows you to copy text from the physical world (like handwriting) and paste it to your computer.

questions.question: Which app is designed to help you learn new languages through gamified lessons?
questions.explanation: Duolingo is a popular language-learning platform that uses game-like elements to teach vocabulary and grammar.

questions.question: What does 'MOOC' stand for in the context of online education?
questions.explanation: MOOCs are free or low-cost online courses available to a large number of participants (e.g., Coursera, edX).

questions.question: Which AI tool helps you create professional presentations quickly by generating slides from a topic?
questions.explanation: Slidesgo offers an AI Presentation Maker that generates slide decks based on your prompts.

questions.question: If you need to find academic research papers and scholarly articles, which search engine is best?
questions.explanation: Google Scholar is a web search engine that indexes the full text or metadata of scholarly literature.

questions.question: What is the function of the 'StayFocusd' app/extension?
options: To limit the time you spend on distracting websites to improve productivity
questions.explanation: StayFocusd increases productivity by limiting the amount of time you can spend on time-wasting websites.

questions.question: Perplexity AI is described as:
options: An AI-powered search and answer engine that provides cited sources
questions.explanation: Perplexity AI combines search engine capabilities with AI to answer questions directly with citations.

questions.question: Which application allows you to track real-time flight traffic around the world?
questions.explanation: Flight Radar displays real-time commercial aircraft flight tracking information on a map.

questions.question: Which tool helps verify if the tone of your writing is confident, friendly, or formal?
questions.explanation: Grammarly analyzes your word choice and punctuation to identify the emotional tone of your message.

questions.question: Scite is an AI tool that revolutionizes research by providing:
options: Smart Citations (showing if a paper supports or contrasts a claim)
questions.explanation: Scite uses deep learning to show the context of citations, indicating if they support, mention, or contrast the claim.

questions.question: Which app is useful for identifying plants by simply taking a picture of them?
questions.explanation: PlantSnap uses image recognition to identify flowers, trees, succulents, and mushrooms.

questions.question: Google Keep is primarily used for:
options: Note-taking, making lists, and setting reminders
questions.explanation: Google Keep is a note-taking service that supports text, lists, images, and audio.

questions.question: Which website is a popular Q&A forum where you can learn by discussing topics with others?
questions.explanation: Quora is a social question-and-answer website where questions are asked, answered, and edited by internet users.

questions.question: Mindly is an app designed for:
options: Creating Mind Maps and organizing thoughts structurally
questions.explanation: Mindly helps structure your inner universe by creating visual mind maps for ideas and projects.

questions.question: Which AI platform helps kids learn coding?
questions.explanation: Tynker provides a creative computing platform for kids to learn programming through games and stories.

questions.question: What is the 'NCERT' website useful for in an Indian academic context?
options: Downloading official school textbooks and eBooks
questions.explanation: The NCERT website provides free access to digital textbooks for students from Class 1 to 12.

questions.question: Which AI tool helps you summarize research papers and understand scientific literature?
questions.explanation: Semantic Scholar is an AI-backed search engine for academic publications that helps researchers find relevant papers faster.
